data.text: @KoalaCourses Makes sense. They will be part of peoples lives moving forward in some way or other! https://t.co/Hi0m8maKlF
@CommsBreakdown @HertsHour @NickBlatchley Apparently they did have video meetings… its 🤯 🎨 Gim #HertsHour
@HertsHour @KoalaCourses @NickBlatchley It all seems very sketchy, which makes you wonder why people didn't twig that this was a scam sooner...you'd deffo want a video call as a minimum #HertsHour

@CommsBreakdown @KoalaCourses @NickBlatchley I imagine it was incredibly easy to set up a website etc - but how do you think meetings went down? No camera meetings (which I think is very strange!) #HertsHour IB

@CommsBreakdown @NickBlatchley Something like that, allegedly. Building up and protecting online reputation takes time and this programme highlights how important these are. It’s worth a watch 🎨 Gim #HertsHour
@KoalaCourses @CommsBreakdown @NickBlatchley This sounds fascinating - will be adding this to my list! #HertsHour IB

@KoalaCourses @NickBlatchley I didn't see the programme, but I read something about how this fictitious design agency got people to work for them for months then disappeared and never paid them.

Shows the importance of researching your client/agency/suppliers etc. #HertsHour
@KoalaCourses @CommsBreakdown No, I didn't see that. I imagine it's still on iPlayer #HertsHour
@CommsBreakdown @NickBlatchley Did you see ‘Jobfishing’ on BBC? In a world where many businesses have gone digital, this is an interesting documentary 🎨 Gim #HertsHour
@NickBlatchley @AceHerts Back to factoring in extra time for commutes on the M25  🎨 Gim #HertsHour https://t.co/ubhIZyxeD1
